question: Which among the following countries constitute the Bay of Bengal Initiative for Multi-Sectoral Technical and Economic Cooperation (BIMSTEC) ?
option2: India, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Thailand, Myanmar
option3: India, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Thailand, Myanmar, Nepal
option4: India, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Thailand, Myanmar, Nepal and Bhutan
answer: India, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Thailand, Myanmar, Nepal and Bhutan
